column2: Remarks
column3: Group code
column5: Whether or not detailed requirements are provided

column2: Property name
column3: Contents of property

column2: Operation status
column3: This property indicates the ON/OFF status.

column2: Electric energy meter classification
column3: This property indicates the electric energy meter type.
column4: 0x30: Electric utility company 0x31: Solar power_x000a_0x32: Fuel cell 0x33: Battery 0x34: EV_x000a_0x35: Others

column2: Owner classification
column3: This property indicates the type of owner of the meter.
column4: 0x30: Not specified_x000a_0x31: Electric utility company 0x32: Other than_x000a_electric utility companies 0x33: Individual

column2: Phases and wires setting status
column3: This property indicates the phases and wires setting status.
column4: Single-phase, two-wire system: 0x30_x000a_Single-phase, three-wire system: 0x31_x000a_Three-phase, three-wire system: 0x32_x000a_Three-phase, four-wire system: 0x33

column2: Composite transformation ratio
column3: This property indicates the composite transformation ratio using a 6-digit decimal notation number.

column2: Multiplying factor for composite transformation ratio
column3: This property indicates the multiplying factor for the composite transformation ratio.

column2: Meter type certification number
column3: This property indicates the_x000a_type-certified meter number using a string of 10 alphanumeric characters

column2: Year and month of inspection expiry
column3: This property indicates the year and month of inspection expiry of the meter by a six-byte ASCII code.

column2: Number of effective digits for cumulative amounts of electric energy
column3: This property indicates the number of effective digits for measured cumulative amounts of electric energy.

column2: Measured cumulative amount of electric energy (normal direction)
column3: This property indicates the measured cumulative amount of electric energy using an 8-digit decimal notation number.

column2: Unit for cumulative amounts of electric energy (normal and reverse directions)
column3: This property indicates the unit (multiplying factor) used for the measured cumulative amount of electric energy and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy.

column2: Historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy_x000a_(normal direction)
column3: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (up to 8 digits), which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours.

column2: Measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (reverse direction)
column3: This property indicates the measured cumulative amounts of electric energy using an 8-digit decimal notation number.

column2: Historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy_x000a_(reverse direction)
column3: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved and the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (up to 8 digits), which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours.

column2: Day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy is to be retrieved
column3: This property indicates the day for which the historical data of measured cumulative amounts of electric energy (which consists of 48 pieces of half-hourly data for the preceding 24 hours) is to be retrieved.
column4: 0x00.0x63 (0.99)_x000a_0: current day_x000a_1. 99: previous day. day that precedes the current day by 99 days

column2: Measured instantaneous electric energy
column3: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous electric energy in watts.

column2: Measured instantaneous currents
column3: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous R and T phase currents in amperes._x000a_In the case of a single-phase,_x000a_two-wire system, 0x7FFE shall be used for the T phase.

column2: Measured instantaneous voltages
column3: This property indicates the measured effective instantaneous R-S(N) and S(N)-T voltages in volts. In the case of a_x000a_single-phase, two-wire system,_x000a_0xFFFE shall be used for the S(N)-T voltage.
column4: 0x0000.0xFFFD (between R and S(N)):_x000a_0x0000.0xFFFD (between S(N) and T)_x000a_(0.6,553.3) : (0.6,553.3)

column2: Cumulative amounts of electric energy measured at fixed time (normal direction)
column3: This property indicates the most recent cumulative amount of electric energy (normal direction)_x000a_measured at 30-minute intervals_x000a_held by the meter in the format of_x000a_4 bytes for date of measurement, 3 bytes for time of measurement, and 4 bytes for cumulative electric energy (normal direction)._x000a_date of measurement_x000a_YYYY:MM:DD_x000a_time of measurement hh:mm:ss_x000a_cumulative electric energy: an_x000a_8-digit decimal notation number

column2: Cumulative amounts of electric energy measured at fixed time (reverse direction)
column3: This property indicates the most recent cumulative amount of electric energy (reverse direction) measured at 30-minute intervals held by the meter in the format of 4 bytes for date of measurement, 3_x000a_bytes for time of measurement, and 4 bytes for cumulative electric energy (reverse direction)._x000a_date of measurement_x000a_YYYY:MM:DD_x000a_time of measurement hh:mm:ss_x000a_cumulative electric energy: an_x000a_8-digit decimal notation number
